Articles.Content:
That's right, I've done it! I've created a rocket that can travel to duna in one stage. It was pretty difficult, I almost didn't have enough fuel to make my mid-course corrections, but I managed to do it!

Album: http://imgur.com/a/uJol5#0

It's pretty long, but the majority of it is EDL

Edited September 25, 2012 by trbinsc
Wow. No images yet but id never even contemplate that endevour. Well done!
I dont think so, i think you used crtl alt shift D it is easy to hide it too..... i dotn beleive you made it all the way to duna with that craft... no way ho say!
Well, craft file is attatched. Knock yourself out.

hmm... seems rather small fuel supply for an interplanetary voyage. I'm skeptical. you didn't use any fuel glitches or cheats?

If you did do it legitly, great job! you should make a video of it next time.

ps: you have about 2,000 extra unnecessary pics in that album

Nope, no exploits or cheats here. All I did was get to about a 42Ã‚Âº phase angle between kerbin and duna, wait till sunrise, launch, and cut the throttle on intercept. After that, I did about 4 mid-course corrections to bring my periapsis inside of Duna's atmosphere. Also, I'm aware that the album is huge, I'll condense a lot of the images into a GIF later.

I'll condense a lot of the images into a GIF later.
That would be cool!

Ok, I was sceptical, but it is indeed possible. I was sloppy with my course corrections, but I *did* manage to intercept Duna with this ship, though I slammed into the surface and died due to lack of fuel. Very, very nice job, mate!
If you click next fast enough it's almost like a gif. Well done!
Great job, I may play around with this.

hmm... seems rather small fuel supply for an interplanetary voyage. I'm skeptical. you didn't use any fuel glitches or cheats?

If you did do it legitly, great job! you should make a video of it next time.

ps: you have about 2,000 extra unnecessary pics in that album

Just fast press next and you have simple animation
How do you get the tertiary purple course indicator on your map? I ever only have the yellow secondary.

How do you get the tertiary purple course indicator on your map? I ever only have the yellow secondary.

Open your settings.cfg file in Notepad and change PATCH_CONIC_DRAW_LIMIT to 3. You can even change it to four or five and get red and green ones on top of the blue yellow and purple ones.

Open your settings.cfg file in Notepad and change PATCH_CONIC_DRAW_LIMIT to 3. You can even change it to four or five and get red and green ones on top of the blue yellow and purple ones.

Thanks a lot! This will be very helpful.

Alright, I made some changes to the album, which includes animations. They are pretty small though, so I might upload them to dropbox or something later.

http://imgur.com/a/Rs8Ak
What program did you use to make it into a gif?
Wow. That's... that's crazy. I can't reliably make it to other planets with ANY rockets, let alone an SSTO. Major props mate

What program did you use to make it into a gif?

I used GIMP.
